translations: 吠陀经，吠陀本集（印度最古老的宗教文献和文学作品的总称，Veda 的复数）

sentences.sentence: In India, an entire class of priests was charged with memorizing the Vedas with perfect fidelity.
sentences.translation: 在印度，一整班的牧师负责完整、准确地背诵《吠陀经》。

sentences.sentence: From You the Vedas have come.
The various states of mind of the Brahmajnani are described in the Vedas.
sentences.translation: 梵之识者的不同思想状态在《吠陀经》里有所描述。
